lines.text:
[checking out the Batmobile]
I want a car. Chicks dig the car.
This is why Superman works alone.
What killed the dinosaurs? The Ice Age!
Let's kick some ice!
Cool party!
Please show some mercy!
Mercy? I'm afraid my condition has left me cold to your pleas of mercy.
My name is Freeze. Learn it well, for it's the chilling sound of your doom.

[freezes Robin]
Stay cool, Birdboy.
Tonight, hell freezes over!
[Batman is trying to melt the ice, when Freeze appears in the magnifying glass of the telescope]
Tonight's forecast... a freeze is coming!
Freeze in hell, Batman!
The Ice Man cometh!
So many people to kill... so little time.
You're not sending ME to the COOLER!
I could have made that jump!
And you could have splattered your brains all over the side of the building.

You know, in the circus, the Flying Graysons were a team. We had to trust each person to do their jobs. That's what being partners is all about. Sometimes, counting on someone else is the only way you win.
Your head wasn't even on the job. All you could think about was Poison Ivy.

You just can't stand it! Maybe she wanted me instead of you. I mean, this is your idea of friendship, isn't it, Bruce? It's your house, it's your rules, it's your way to the highway! It's Batman and Robin, not Robin and Batman, and I'm sick of it!
Yes, it's my rules. *My* rules to keep us alive, and if you want to stay in this house, and on this team, you will abide by them!
This is no partnership. You're never gonna trust me!
And you are...?
Batgirl.
That's not very PC. What about Batwoman, or Batperson?
Bruce, it's me, Barbara. I found the Batcave.
We gotta get those locks changed.
She knows who we are.
I guess we'll just have to kill her.
Yep, we'll kill her later, we've got work to do.
[talking about Poison Ivy]
I can't believe we were fighting over a bad guy!
Bad- Yes. Guy? No.
Well I'm totally over her, alright? Positively!
Me too! Definitely!
[pause]
Great stems, though...
Buds, too.
Yeah, those were nice...
In this universe, there's only one absolute... everything freezes!
Hey, Freeze. The heat is on.
Please be here for me!
Actually I'm looking for Alfred.
As I told Lady Freeze when I pulled her plug, this is a one woman show.
Who invited you?
I was just hanging around.
I thought you were gonna stay in the museum. Round up some thugs.
How 'bout, "Nice to see ya? Glad you're here to save my life."

[to Robin]
You get the ice, I'll get the Ice Man.
If revenge is a dish best served cold, then put on your Sunday finest. It's time to feast!
Chicks like you give women a bad name.
Sir! Sir! You've gotta see this!
[Freeze freezes him]
I hate it when they talk during the movie.
Hi, Freeze. I'm Batman.
[slides down dinosaur statue]
Nice catch.
You break it, you buy it.
[last lines]
Partners?
Partners.
Partners.
We're going to need a bigger cave.
Well, he's over-eager. He's impulsive. I can't trust him not to get hurt.
Perhaps the truth is you really don't trust anyone.
Oh, don't tell me you're on his side, again.

Despite all your talents, you are still a novice in the ways of family. Master Dick follows the same star as you but gets there by his own course. You must learn to trust him, for that is the nature of family.
I trust *you*, Alfred.
But I shan't be here forever.
If I must suffer, humanity will suffer with me.
She knows who we are. Guess we'll have to kill her.
Yep, we'll kill her later. We've got work to do.
I will blanket the city in endless winter. First Gotham, and then the world.

Just what I had in mind. Everything dead on earth, except us. A chance for Mother Nature to start again. Behold, the dawn of a new age. My mutant plants have the strength of the deadliest animals. Once you have frozen mankind, these babies will overrun the globe, and we shall rule them, for we will be the only two people left in the world.
Adam and Evil!
I'll kill you next time!
No matter what anyone tells you, Bane, it really is the size of your gun that counts.

[referring to Batman and Robin]
Their bones will turn to ice! Their blood will freeze in my hands!
Uh-oh!
I'm putting you on ice.
He loves me. He loves me not. He loves me. He loves me...
NOT! Surprise, I am your new cell mate. And I'm here to make your life a living hell. Prepare for a bitter harvest. Winter has come at last.
[Batman and Robin are being attacked by Freeze's henchmen]
It's the hockey team from hell!
Where's the snowman?
Maybe he melted.
No, he's just hibernating.
You're pretty good at this, little girl.
Well watch and learn, little boy.
[Batman has taken beating from Bane and lies stunned on the ground. Ivy moves over to him]

[standing over Batman]
There's something about an anatomically correct...

[she lies down next to him]
... rubber suit that puts *fire* in a girl's lips.
[Poison Ivy blows a cloud of lovedust in Batman's face]

[resisting]
Why are all the gorgeous ones homicidal maniacs? Is it me?

[smiling seductively]
Enough. Sweet talk...
Uncle Alfred's been supporting me his whole life, I'm going to take him away from all this.
Alfred and Bruce are like family.
Paying someone to do your dishes, cook your meals, you call that family?
I need a sign that you've turned over a new leaf.
How about "slippery when wet?"

[Poison Ivy sneaks up on Robin]
Hey there, pretty birdie!
Give yourself up! If you surrender...
-to you?
[She blows lovedust in Robin's face]

[Offering her hand]
Polly wanna kiss?
Hello. Sorry about the door. Is the party over?
We'll have to do this upside-down.
Men, always doing things the hard way.
Let me guess, Plant Girl? Vine Lady? Huh? Hand over the diamond Garden Gal, or I'll turn you into mulch!
Take two of these, and call me in the morning.
Can you be cold, Batman? You have eleven minutes to thaw a bird. What will you do? Chase the villain or save the boy? Your emotions make you weak. That's why this day is mine!
I hate to disappoint you but my rubber lips are immune to your charms.
There's just something about an anatomically correct rubber suit that puts fire in a girl's lips.
Why is it that all the beautiful ones are homicidal maniacs? Is it me?
Brother, dear... I heard you were blue!

[smitten]
Don't mind us, ma'am. You can speak freely!
[Poison Ivy blows a cloud of lovedust in his face]
Oh I don't mind you at all!
[she blows a second cloud into the second guard's face]

[walking and talking with the guards in tow]
Men! The most *absurd* of God's creatures!
We give you life... and we can take it away *just* as easily!

[sarcasticly]
Right. Whatever!
[laughs]

[putting a hand on the second guard's face]
I really *am* to die for...
Come join me. My garden needs tending.

[about street racing not mixing well with being an Oxford student]
They kicked me out, but it doesn't matter because I've already won all the money I need to do what I've always dreamed.
Just don't tell me you're going to run away and join the circus.
Kill them, of course. But why stop there? Why should only Batman and Robin die while the society that created them goes unpunished?

Yes! If I must suffer... Humanity will suffer with me! I shall repay them for sentencing me to a life without human comfort. I will blanket the city in endless winter! First... Gotham. And then... The world!

[to Poison Ivy]
Using feminine wiles to get what you want? Trading on your looks? Read a book, sister. That passive-aggressive number went out years ago.
There is no defeat in death, Master Bruce. Victory comes in defending what we know is right while we still live.

[sighs]
Well, I can respect your opinion. Sadly, I'm not good at rejection. I'm afraid you'll have to die!
[talking about Mr. Freeze]
That's not a man. That is a God.
I am Nature's arm. Her spirit. Her will. Hell, I am Mother Nature, and the time has come for plants to take back the world so rightfully ours! 'cause it's not nice to fool with Mother Nature.
Batface and Birdbrain turned out to be much more resistant to my love-dust than expected... No matter. Next time I'll just give them a stronger dose. They'll literally be dying for me!
Men, the most absurd of God's creatures. We give you life... and we can take it away just as easily.
I hope Mr. Bane can swim.
Alfred's sick.
Alfred's not sick, he's dying.
Dying? Why didn't he tell us?
You know Alfred, he wouldn't say anything, but I can tell.
Damn.
Damn? Damn's not good.
Those targeting mirrors are frozen, the thawing beam won't work.
Watch the numbers, Batman, for they are the harbingers of your doom. Can you feel it coming? The icy cold of space! Ahh! At 30,000 feet, your heart will *freeze* and be no more!
Bombs away, Batman!

[in the Batcave; Alfred's image is on a computer screen]
Uncle Alfred, it's me, Barbara!
I expected you might find your way down here. I programmed my brain al-algorithms into the Batcomputer to create a virtual simu-simulation.
I want to help Batman and Robin.
I anticipated you would, and took the liberty to create something in your size.
Suit me up, Uncle Alfred!
I need to get more diamonds from my hideout.
I can help you grab your rocks.
[Robin gets up to fight Bane once again when]
Stop!
[Robin stops as Poison Ivy blows lovedust in his face]

[she backs a dumbstruck Robin against a railing]
Living in the shadow of the big, bad Bat!

[putting her arms on his shoulders]
You don't need him. *You're* the star!
I can see it now! Your own *big*... *bright*... signal in the sky!

[lustfully, putting her arms around his neck]
Let me guide you...
[Batman's fight with Bane is going unnoticed by Poison Ivy and Robin. Batman is winning]

[Poison Ivy moves in to kiss him]
Let me kiss you...
[Poison Ivy auctions herself to the Ball-goers via a microphone]
Some lucky boy's about hit the honey pot...

[moving over to Batman and Robin]
I'll include an evening of my company for the winner.

[stopping in-between them]
I'll bring everything you see here... *Plus*, everything you don't!
Curses!
Freezy, I'm feeling hot.
I find that unlikely.
Okay, so my hair is brittle and my skin is dry. I'd weather the blizzards just to have you. You're the most perfect man I've ever known. What do you say we heat things up?
My passion thaws for my bride alone.
Ooh. Talk about your cold shoulder.

One more giant diamond of this size, then my freeze engine will be complete. Aah. First, I will freeze the city, then I will hold Gotham ransom. Unless the city bows for my demands, it's winter forever in Gotham. The city fathers will have no choice but to give me the billions I need to complete my research, then I can find the cure.
[Poison Ivy is disguised as Pamela Isley. She addresses Gordon with her back to him]

[Over]
... Comissioner Gordon.

[He acknowledges her]
Yes?

[She faces him in turn, seductively]
I've always wondered... where does that big, old Bat-light come from?
[She blows a cloud of love-dust in his face from an ivy-leaf compact; Gordon is suddenly enamoured by her]

[Struggling to keep his composure]
Why... it's... right on top of police headquarters!

[Ivy beams seductively as she leads Gordon away like a puppy dog]
I'd just *love* to see it! But you probably don't have access...

[Gordon falls for her trap]
Why, dear lady...
*I*... am the comissioner of the police, I have the keys...
[he takes them out from his jacket]
right here in my pocket. Would you like to see it?
[Ivy towers over Gordon. Slowly she opens the case once more and languidly blows another cloud into the police chief's face; fully entrancing him into a love-drunk stupor]

[weakly as Ivy claims the keys from his hand]
Who *are* you, dear lady...?
[Her goal earned, Ivy prepares to administer the coup de grace. She leans in for a kiss]

[Stopping short]
On second thought, you're *way* too old for me!

[watching vainly as Ivy dashes off, leaving him alone]
No, I'm not... Please... come back...
Alfred, am I pig headed? Is it always my way or the highway?

Yes, actually. Death and chance, stole your parents. But rather than become a victim, you have done everything in your power to control the fates. For what is Batman? If not an effort to master the chaos that sweeps our world. An attempt to control death, itself.

[pause]
But I can't, can I?
None of us can.
I'm not the marrying kind.
I'm late for the dedication, then I go after Freeze and Ivy alone.
LIKE HELL YOU ARE.
-Don't push me right now.
What? Nobody can face IVY but the big, bad Bat? YOU WANT HER FOR YOURSELF
That's right, Dick. I want HER so much I can tastE IT. That's the whole point. She's done something to us. She has us fighting over her somehow.
I know she loves me and not you, and it's driving you crazy.
Listen Dick, why do you think she's so desperate to kiss us? I bet her lips are poisoned.
A poison kiss? You don't understand. She understands how I feel.
She has clouded your mind and you're not thinking straight.
I am thinking straight, for the first time in a long time. I want a Robin signal in the sky. I'm sick of being in your shadow.

Hello, Jason. I think I've had a change of heart. Quite literally. The animal-plant toxins had a rather unique effect on me. They replaced my blood with aloe, my skin with chlorophyll, and filled my lips...
[She passionately kisses him on the lips]
... with venom. Oh and Jason, one other thing. I probably should've mentioned this earlier. I'm poison.

[to Batman]
A poison kiss? You have some real issues with women, you know that? You just couldn't stand it that she was going to kiss me and not you, wasn't it? You couldn't stand it that she wanted me and not you!

[Batman bids for Poison Ivy]
One million dollars!

[as does Robin]
Two million!
You don't have it. Three million!
I'll borrow it from you! Four million!
Five million!
That's a utility belt not a money belt. Six million.
[Batman looks at Robin and then produces something from said-belt]

[firmly]
Seven million.
FOREVER]
Never leave the cave without it!

[amused by the squabble she's caused]
You two boys aren't going to start fighting over little old me, now are you?
I'm a lover, not a fighter. That's why every Poison Ivy action figure comes complete with him!
[Bane attacks]
My father once told me, "To succeed, we need only pick a star and follow it."
Vengeance isn't power. Anyone can take a life.But to give life... that's true power.
Friend... Partner... Brother... Will *you*... trust *me* now?
Mammals, a day of reckoning is coming. That's right, the same plants and flowers that saw you crawl from the primordial soup will reclaim the planet. And there will be no-one to protect you.
You must be new in town. In Gotham City, Batman and Robin protect us... even from plants and flowers.
Poison... Poison Ivy.
Hi there.

[walks over to Ivy]
Is your thumb the only part of you that's green?
You will just *have* to find out!
I want us to be together but, I also wanna make sure your serious about turning over a new leaf...

[sits down beside her]
I need a sign.
How about 'Slippery when Wet'?
Of trust. Tell me your plan.
Kiss me and I'll tell you.
Tell me and I'll kiss you.
Freeze has taken the new telescope and turned it into a giant freezing-gun. He's about to turn Gotham into an icecube.

[he turns to go]
I've gotta stop him!

[pulls him back to face her]
One kiss, my love... for luck.
Some lucky boy's about to hit the honey pot. The winner will receive an evening of my company. I'll bring everything you see here, plus, everything you don't.
It took God seven days to create paradise. Let's see if I can do better.

[to Nora Freeze]
I've never been good with competition. Who needs a frigid wife anyway?

[to Robin]
Stop living in the shadow of the big bad bat. You don't need him. You're the star. I can see it now. Your own big bright signal in the sky. Let me guide you. Let me kiss you.
Kiss me and I'll tell you.
Tell me and I'll kiss you.
[Alfred misses the doorbell]
I must have dozed off. My sincerest apologies.
Oh, there's no apology necessary, Alfred. It's the first time it's happened in 30 years.

[in the research lab]
I call this little number... Bane. Bane of humanity!

[at Arkham Asylum]
Let's cool it for now. There's someone I'd like you to meet.
[Bane arrives, carrying Freeze's cryo-suit]
His name is Bane.
A laundry service that delivers. Wow!

[watching Freeze suit up]
What are you, a fifty big and tall?
No. I always go a size smaller. Makes me look slimmer.

[to Robin]
One kiss, my love. For luck...
[Poison Ivy passionately kisses Robin on the lips with a hint of a smile on her face]

[Pulling away with a look of mock-sympathy on her face]
Bad luck I'm afraid... Time to die, little Robin!
